text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium menonorum is a monoverticillate, non-vesiculate species of the genus Penicillium which was isolated from rhizosphere soil in Korea. Penicillium menonorum can promote plant growth and improve soil fertility
text.Further reading:
Babu, A. G.; Kim, S. W.; Yadav, D. R.; Hyum, U.; Adhikari, M.; Lee, Y. S. (2015). "Penicillium menonorum: A Novel Fungus to Promote Growth and Nutrient Management in Cucumber Plants". Mycobiology. 43: 49. doi:10.5941/MYCO.2015.43.1.49. PMC 4397380.
